assignments.description: Have students independently read the magazine KIDS DISCOVER MESOPOTAMIA then answer questions on the sheets “It`s in the Reading” and “Everything Visual”.  For question 9 on the sheet “It`s in the Reading,” remind students to answer with complete sentence.  In addition, on the sheet “Everything Visual, remind students to answer with complete sentences.”

assignments.description:
Make sure your binders have the following:
1) Labeled with first and last name, Social Studies, color group
2) four dividers
3) dividers labeled Syllabus, Assignments, Projects, W.I.P.
4) Vision Statement in front of binder
5) Syllabus behind the syllabus divider
6) notebook paper in front or back of binder
assignments.name: Binder check

assignments.description: Students need to read and discuss the syllabus with their parents.  If parents have further questions about the syllabus, feel free to email me.  Then parents need to sign the signature page.
assignments.name: Syllabus signature page
